name: Miniscule
description: Becomes super small and increases evasion against attacks by 1 stage.

name: Icky
description: Boosts the power of OOZE & FUNGAL type attacks by 20%.

name: Burdened
description: A large growth reduces SPD by 1 stage but raises DEF by 1 stage

name: Broodmother
description: Gains 1 stage of ATK for each Oochamon with the same type in the party.

name: Tough
description: A durable body grants a 1 stage increase to DEF.

name: Shadow
description: Grants a 25% chance to VANISH after being attacked.

name: Withering
description: Loss of the body reduces HP by 5% each turn, but raises SPD by 2 stages.

name: Darkbright
description: Attacks that afflict BURN also BLIND and vice-versa.

name: Gentle
description: A kind heart reduces both your ATK and the enemy ATK by 1 stage.

name: Warm
description: Increases the damage of FLAME attacks by 10%.

name: Radiant
description: Dangerous energy causes attacks that BURN also INFECT.

name: Conflicted
description: Multiple minds increase ALL stats by 1 stage.

name: Burrower
description: Increases the damage of STONE attacks by 10%.

name: Reactive
description: When hit by an attack, reflects 10% of the attacker's HP as damage.

name: Inertia
description: Increases SPD by 1 stage each turn.

name: Dense
description: Increases ATK by 1 stage but reduces SPD by 1 stage.

name: Moist
description: Halves all incoming FLAME damage.

name: Alert
description: Increases ATK by 1 stage when an Oochamon switches in.

name: Fleeting
description: Increases SPD and ATK by 2 stages but also loses half of current HP each turn.

name: Efficient
description: Increases ATK by 1 stage each turn.

name: Boisterous
description: Shatters eardrums when it enters the field dealing 10% of the enemy's HP

name: Haunted
description: Applies the DOOMED status to an enemy when the holder of the ability dies.

name: Leech
description: Restores HP equal to 10% of damage done to the enemy.

name: Ensnare
description: Grants a 30% chance to SNARE an enemy when attacking.

name: Uncontrolled
description: Increases ATK by 3 stages and reduces DEF by 1 stages but randomly chooses an attack each turn

name: Apprentice
description: Increases ATK by 2 stages if any other party members share a move with it.

name: Focused
description: Increases damage of attacks by 10% if unaffected by status effects.

name: Ravenous
description: Restores 20% of max HP upon defeating an enemy.

name: Immense
description: Increases DEF by 2 stages but also makes opponent's moves always hit.

name: Armored
description: Reduces STONE damage by 20%.

name: Scorching
description: Attacks that can BURN always BURN.

name: Tangled
description: Causes enemies that hit it to be SNARED.

name: Mundane
description: Cannot be affected by Status Effects.

name: Rogue
description: DOUBLES the damage dealt to full HP enemies.

name: Crystallize
description: Boosts the power of Ooze, Flame, and Stone attacks by 30%.

name: Lacerating
description: All attacks do an extra attack to an enemy, dealing 5% of their max HP.

name: Gravity
description: Attacks deal 1% more damage per number of turns in this battle.

name: Sporespray
description: INFECTS the enemy when defeated.

name: Frostbite
description: Attacks that strike an enemy reduce their SPD by 1 stage.

name: Bipolar
description: Use the DEF stat when dealing damage.

name: Hexiply
description: Attacks deal 6% more damage per sixth of HP remaining.

name: Nullify
description: Change an opponents ability to Null while out on the field.

name: Duplicant
description: Copy the opponent's ability.

name: Null
description: Does nothing.

name: Immobile
description: Always go last when attacking.

name: Strings Attached
description: 20% chance to apply a randomly apply BURN, INFECT, BLIND, or SNARE when attacking.

name: Corrosive
description: Attacks deal more damage to enemies with high DEF.

name: Spectral
description: Changes type to Magic every other turn.

name: Height Advantage
description: Increases chance to do a critical hit by 10%.

name: Hearty
description: Increases damage done by 15% while above 50% HP.

name: Radioactive
description: Changes type to Flame every other turn.

name: Energized
description: Increases ATK and SPD by 1 stage on kill.

name: Patient
description: Increases DEF by 1 stage each turn.

name: Easy Go
description: Heals the rest of your party by 20% of their max HP when defeated.

name: Bomber
description: Halves the enemy HP on death.

name: Flammable
description: Gains 1 stage of ATK when hit with a FLAME type move.

name: Hole Dweller
description: Gets the Vanished status at the end of every other turn.

name: Power Conduit
description: Boosts the power of FLAME moves against OOZE and TECH types by 50%.

name: Liquid Cooled
description: Prevents BURN and boosts the power of TECH type moves by 25%.

name: Increment
description: Randomly boosts a stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

name: Parry
description: Reduces damage taken by 20%. When hit by an attack, this ability becomes Riposte.

name: Riposte
description: Increases damage dealt by 20%. After attacking or the turn ends, this ability becomes Parry.

name: Swaying
description: Increases DEF by 1 stage but lowers accuracy by 1 stage.

name: Thrashing
description: Increases ATK by 1 stage but lowers evasion by 1 stage.

name: Union
description: Increases ATK and DEF by 1 stage.

name: Protector
description: Immune to inneffective damage during the turn it switches in.

name: Phantasmal
description: Immune to Neutral-type moves.

name: Matryoshka
description: The first time it would be KO'd, restores its HP to half.

name: Thorned
description: Attacks deal extra damage based on DEF.

name: Downward Spiral
description: Randomly lowers one of its stats 1 stage at the end of each turn.

name: Constructor
description: Raises DEF by 1 stage each turn.

name: Neutralizer
description: No Oochamon are affected by status effects.

name: Bass Boost
description: Boosts the power of Sound moves by 15%.

name: Stealthy
description: Gets FOCUSED if it hasn't dealt damage this turn.
